Product Description

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

Samsung Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active

Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra 5G, Note 20 5G, Note 10 Plus 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8

Samsung Galaxy A02s, A03s, A03, A3, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, A10, A10E, A11, A12

Samsung Galaxy A20, A21, A21s, A22, A31, A32, A40, A41, A42, A50, A51, A52, A53, A60, A70, A70s, A71 5G, A72, A80, A90

Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2/ Z Fold 3/ Z Fold 4/ Z Flip/ Z Flip 3/ Z Flip 4/ F52

Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0(2018), Tab A 10.1 (2019), Tab 10.5, Tab A 8.0

Google Pixel, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel XL

LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus

One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p

Other USB Type C Device

INPUT:

100 – 240 VAC ; 50-60HZ 0.50A

OUTPUT

9V/1.67A ; 5V/2.00A

What is Adaptive Fast Charging

This technology allows the smartphone to be charged with a faster speed, battery can charge faster up to 75% .

Will this product charge other Android phones quickly?

Yes. As long as your device supports Quick Charge QC2.0 & QC3.0, our wall charger block with Type-C cable will charge your device at a fast manner.

What is the difference between Quick Charge (QC) and Adaptive Fast charging (ADC)?

They are basically the same technology but brands marketed in different name. While Qualcomm named it Quick Charge, Samsung named it Adaptive Fast Charging.

Safe Fast Charger & Sync

Fast charger delivers up to output current of 15W, 75% faster than standard chargers, it also has the sync feature, most importantly, it is made for safe charging, it can intelligently recognize the battery type and status, will automatically stop charging when fully charged to prevent from short circuit, over-current, over-voltage, over-heating and over-charging.

Perfect for Any Occasions

These fasting charging kit is great for home, office, restaurant, tour, hotel etc.

High Quality ABS Material

Made of ABS material for the charger shell, shockproof and protect from over-heating & short-circuit

Easy to Carry

Compact classic design is portable to carry anywhere, slim and lightweight

【Quick Charge 3.0 Rapid Charging】Adaptive type c fast charger, enables your battery from zero to 50% in just 30 minutes, 75% faster than standard chargers.
【Fast & Sync】 USB c cell phone wall charger kit charges Samsung phones and tablets with USB 2. 0 ports at max high speed of 480 Mbps. It also charge USB-C devices without the Fast Charging feature as well, with up to a 2 Amp charging rate. Besides, it also has data transfer feature for convenient usage.
【Wide Compatibility】Compatible AFC (Adaptive Fast Charging): Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, S21 Plus, S21, S20 Ultra, S20 Plus, S20, S20 FE, S10, S10e, S10+, S9, S9+, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active, Galaxy Note 20 Ultra , Note 20 5G, Note 10+ 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8, Galaxy A90, A80, A71 5G, A70s, A52, A51, A20, Galaxy Z Fold2, Z Fold2 5G, Z Flip, Z Flip 5G, Fold, GOOGLE Pixel 1, 2, 3, 6, Pixel XL, LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus, One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p and other USB Type C Device
【Package List】Replace or refund within one year without return, lifetime technical support. Package included: 2x Wall Charger Plug Box Brick and 2x Type-C [ 6 Feet ] Cord.

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

Samsung Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer No
Date First Available June 30, 2017
Manufacturer Panasonic
Country of Origin Malaysia

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ]

Price: $180.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:56 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGF575S, with DECT 6.0 and Link2 Cell technology, answering system, dual keypad and 5 cordless phones handsets, allows you to link up to two cell or smart phones and integrate them into the telephone system via Bluetooth, no landline phone line required. All of your contacts stored into your cell or smart phone can be shared with this phone system allowing you access to important contacts right from the handset. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from the base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. The Panasonic home phone with answering machine also features easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Do not overload power outlets and extension cords. This can result in the risk of fire or electric shock.
Expandable Panasonic Cordless Phone with Answering Machine: 5-handset home phone system with added features to keep you connected; Digital Answering Machine stores 18-min of messages
Interference-Free, Secure Phone Signal: DECT 6.0 wireless technology for whole home coverage and less interference from other electronics; ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls
Bluetooth Phone Connects to Cell and Voice Assistants: Make and receive calls from your cellular device with Link2Cell pairing up to 2 cell phones; connect handsets to Siri, Google Now and S Voice through Voice Assist feature
Bi-Lingual Talking Caller ID and Smart Call Blocker: Talking caller ID announces caller information in English or Spanish; block unwanted calls with the push of a button on telephone handset or main base unit
More Features to Enjoy: Handset to handset intercom and baby monitor function, battery back-up for up to 12-hr talk time when the power goes out, 3000-entry phone book, and more

Advanced Calling Made Easy

Improved five-handset system syncs two smartphones, connects to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice, blocks unwanted callers, includes Talking Caller ID, and a headset jack. Expandable up to six handsets.

Read more

Sync Two Smartphones

The simple push of a button links up to two smartphones to make and receive cell calls routed through your Link2Cell handsets. Advanced Class 1 Bluetooth extends calling range to 330 ft. to easily handle calling from both cell lines simultaneously.

Connect to Siri, Google Now and S Voice

When synced to your smartphone via Link2Cell, you can connect to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice anytime from your handsets with the Voice Assist feature. Simply press ‘Assist’ on the handset or base unit to send voice commands for making phone calls, checking new messages, weather and more, and hear the responses on the handset.

Block Bothersome Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers, and other unwanted caller numbers. One button registers up to 250 caller numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Talking Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, Panasonic’s advanced Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish and Text ID tell you who’s calling with text-to-speech announcements from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Read more

Beyond Intercom

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic ‘s exclusive Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Power When the Power Goes Out with Low Battery Alert

Included rechargeable backup batteries keep you connected when the power goes out. With a fully charged handset in the base unit, you’ll have power for up to 12 hours talk time and 7 days standby for calls using other cordless handsets in the house.

Now, when any of your handsets are running low on power, the handsets alert you. And as an added convenience, a large, highly-visible battery status icon on the handset LCD lets you know as well.

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Large Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch high-contrast white backlit LCD and enlarged, easier to see and use dial keys and function control buttons make home and home office call management quicker and more convenient for everyone.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGF575S system, you can program and store up to 3,000 numbers in your phonebook, and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings and handset-to-handset intercom.

App Alert (for Android) :

Download the Panasonic Link2Cell app to stay informed and up to date via your smartphone, tablet and Link2Cell system. Receive SMS, email, calendar, low battery notice, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram notifications on your Link2Cell base unit and LCD handsets.

Accessories :

The KX-TGF575S base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws. Two rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries plus a belt clip are also included.

What’s in the Box :

  • KX-TGF575S phone system base unit
  • 5 Cordless handsets
  • 4 Chargers
  • 5 Belt clips
  • Wall mount
  • 10 Rechargeable Ni-MH AAA-size batteries

Read more

Price: $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:05:51 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic KX TGD532W expandable Digital Enhanced Cordless Telecommunications (DECT) 6.0 Phone system with answering machine and 2 cordless handsets is a smart, reliable home phone/home office solution designed to make everyday call management easier and more convenient for everyone. Includes one cordless handset in the base unit and two additional cordless handsets, expandable up to six handsets (additional handsets sold separately). Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text to speech announcements in English or Spanish from the phone’s base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. Quickly see who’s calling with 1. 6″ White backlit display, eliminate unwanted calls with Call Block capability, and all digital answering machine functions tie it all together making this cordless phone system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Guided feature tutorials are available for this cordless phone on the manufacturer’s website. Disclaimer: DECT 6. 0 is a North American marketing term for DECT devices manufactured for the United States and Canada operating at 1. 9 GHz.
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 150 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing aid T coil (TIA 1083 compliant). Number of Phone Lines: 1
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
Quick Read Message Counter: Instantly know how many phone messages you have received with a large, easy to read message counter on the phone system’s elegant cordless base unit
High Contrasts Displays & Keypads: Large 1.6 inch backlit LCD cordless handset screens clearly show call functions in any light; Soft touch amber backlit keypads Enhance readability; Talk time up to 10 hours; Standby time up to 5 days (120 hours); Charge time about 7 hours
Telephone Ringer IDs: Assigned pre-programmed ringtones will sound on the phone’s base unit and cordless handsets when corresponding caller ID numbers are received from incoming telephone calls

Simplify Everyday Calling

Add more ease to your calling with this improved, clear white home system and two handsets. It’s expandable up to six handsets for optimum convenience throughout the house.

Read more

Block Unwanted Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers and other bothersome callers. One button registers up to 150 numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Bi-Lingual Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, advanced Talking Caller ID tells you clearly with advanced text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Quick-Read Message Counter

Instantly know how many messages you have received with a large, easy-to-read message counter on the phone system’s elegant base unit.

Read more

Improved Displays and Keypads

In one quick glance, large, 1.6-inch, high-contrast white backlit LCD handset screens clearly show calling functions in any light. Soft-touch amber backlit keypads and smartly positioned phone function buttons provide enhanced readability.

Ringer IDs

Select a ringer from the system’s library to link individual ringtones to your pre-programmed phone book entries. Your assigned pre-programmed ringtones will sound when corresponding Caller ID numbers are received from incoming calls.

All-Digital Voicemail

Recording, retrieving and storing voicemail is easy with a digital capacity of up to 17 minutes of messaging. A bright message counter on the base unit lets you know how many you’ve received. Handsets provide talk time up to 10 hours and up to 5 days of standby time.

Extend Talk Time

With the system’s Intelligent Eco Mode, handset power consumption lowers automatically on the handset nearest the base unit. The result is extended talk time and less power used by the handset and base unit.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGD532W system you can program and store up to 100 numbers in your phonebook and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings.

Accessories.

The KX-TGD532W base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws.

What’s in the Box:

  • Panasonic KX-TGD532W clear white base unit
  • 2 Cordless handsets
  • Wall mount
  • 2 Rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries

Read more

Warranty & Support

Price: $25.99 - $13.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

YOUR CHOICE OF SHADE… Semi-Transparent Sunshades

Semi-transparent sunshades are for areas in which Sun & UV protection are more important than visibility such as baby car seat sun protection for infants, small children, pets, adults with sensitive skin, pilots of aircraft and watercraft, providing the ultimate protection for the whole family.

Transparent Sunshades

Transparent window shades are lighter shades, ideal for the front side window of a vehicle, where visibility is more important. It can also be used on any glass surface from your kitchen window to the school bus.

Quality Matters! 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁y

Kinder Fluff sun shades are made of 120GSM (versus commonly used 80 GSM), combined with 15s tinted static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s).

𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with higher quality connector clamps, preventing breakage/separation of the wires during folding.

𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗 (SPF 100)

The Only Certified Window Sunshade in the Market!

Proven to block 99.79% of UVA and 99.95% of UVB!

With the max level of UPF in the category 50+

Trusted Brand

Kinder Fluff takes pride in doing it right! We open up the door & show you what to look for when choosing a high-quality sunshade.

-Because We Care-

(Flip to see more)

Feel The Difference…

This set contains 2 Transparent and 2 semi-transparent sunshades + a storage bag.

Made of 120GSM mesh and 15s film, this certified and award-winning sunshade, blocks more sun and ultraviolet rays, providing better sun protection to the skin.

Overlap to cover larger windows.

(Flip to see more)

𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗

The Only Certified Window Sunshade in the Market!

Proven to block 99.79% of UVA and 99.95% of UVB!

With the maximum level of UPF in the category (50+) and maximum protection of 100 SPF.

(Flip to see more)

Overlap to fit

Designed to fit any large window size by simply overlapping. Perfect for car side windows, windshield, rear, back seat as a baby car seat sun protection, at home, in the office, on the boat, airplane, bus, train, farm… Kinder Fluff protects the whole family from sun exposure, including pets & plants.

Please Note: the shades are packed back to back to protect the film from damage & it may appear as 2 pieces rather than 4. Please pull them apart gently and you will have a complete set of 4.

(Flip to see more)

𝗜𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗿, 𝗮𝗶𝗿𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗲, 𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽, 𝗯𝘂𝘀, 𝘃𝗮𝗻 𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻..

Protect yourself and your loved ones from the heat, glare and the damaging sun throughout the day.

According to EPA, most of an average person’s UV exposure from the sun occurs before the age of 18. Too much UV exposure or frequent sunburns, particularly during childhood, can cause severe or serious damage to the skin.

For peace of mind, go with certified sunshades, choose Kinder Fluff.

(Flip to see more)

𝗙𝗼𝗿 𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 𝘂𝘀𝗲

Do you have that kitchen window that lets too much sun in, spoiling your cooking activity?

Or an office window that the sun glares to your face when you are trying to see your laptop screen?

Then this sunshade is for you. Perfect sized at 20”x12″, it sticks to any glass surface including the ones inside the house and fits most window size by simply overlapping each other.

(Flip to see more)

𝗔𝗻𝘆𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲, 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲…

Kinder Fluff sunshades are designed to fit any large window size by simply overlapping them. Perfect for car windows, windshield, and back seat windows as a baby car sun shade and also any large windows, such as aircraft or watercraft, or the ones inside your house.

If it is good enough for a pilot in high altitude , it is definitely good enough to protect you on the ground.

The only Certified Sunshade & The Winner of Mom’s Choice Gold Award Install and remove in seconds

Due to the static effect created by the film, this sunshade will cling to any glass surface without any suction cup or adhesive. simply put the shade on the window and gently press to stabilize.

Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such a case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

𝐆𝐎𝐋𝐃 𝐀𝐖𝐀𝐑𝐃

The Gold Winner of Mom’s Choice Award.

The Mom’s Choice Awards (MCA) evaluates products and services created for children, families and educators. The program is globally recognized for establishing the benchmark of excellence in family-friendly media, products and services.

𝗚𝗢 𝗕𝗘𝗬𝗢𝗡𝗗 𝗔𝗪𝗔𝗥𝗗

Winner of the global acknowledgement of businesses who went above and beyond to make the world a better place!

KinderFluff is dedicated to offering premium quality products and affordable for consumers who seek baby products that are both comfortable and safe, after all, “Because We Care” is our motto.

This is how it works…

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with tightly woven fabric structured with fewer “holes or spaces” for the UVR not to sneak through to your skin. The UV absorption is enhanced using black dye. Then the UV absorbers and blockers are added during the manufacturing process which also increase the sun protection ability of the mesh, providing extra sun protection and UVR block for the whole family and your car’s interior.

No suction cups or adhesive and definitely no residue

Due to the Static Effect created by the thick film, these shades “cling” to the window without any suction cups or adhesive. easy on easy off for any glass surface

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗧𝗿𝘂𝘀𝘁

Often you won’t get any information about the structure of car window shades in the market. No one will tell you what type of fabric they are made of or what kind of film they use. Simply because they are not top of the line! Kinder Fluff takes pride in doing it right! We open up the door & show you what to look for when looking for a high quality sun shade. We’re the only brand with certified shades proven to block over 99%UVR rays & MCA Gold winner. We have confidence in our quality.

Videos and How To Fold Instructions

(Flip to see more…)

𝗜𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘀 𝘄𝗲 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺?

𝗦𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝘀𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝗬𝗘𝗦!

Watch the video for UV protection and then flip to watch the video for sun exposure.

-Because we care-

(Flip to see more…)

𝗜𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘀 𝘄𝗲 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺?

𝑾𝒂𝒕𝒄𝒉 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒗𝒊𝒅𝒆𝒐 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒔𝒆𝒆 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓𝒔𝒆𝒍𝒇!

.

.

Then flip to learn about the visibility.

(Flip to see more…)

Quality Matters

Made of 120GSM mesh and 15s film, certified and award winner, it blocks more sun and ultraviolet rays, providing better sun protection to the skin.

(Flip to see more…)

Anywhere, Everywhere…

Where sun and UVR protection is needed!

In the car, on the bus, airplane, boat, home or office… it clings in any glass type, even the ones inside of your house or tinted ones.

Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

(Flip to see more…)

𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻

Remove from the pack & separate the shades carefully attached to each other by the cling film side.

How to install: 1.Wipe the window with a damp cloth. 2.Place the Window Shade with the static side on the window. 3.Apply pressure throughout the sun shade until it is firmly pressed to the window.

Note: It’s normal to see wrinkles on the shades when you first receive them. This is the nature of the film & happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

Play & flip to see more

(Flip to see more…)

𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

When not in use Twist to Fold into a small circle and fit in the provided storage bag for easy storage inside any handbag, car organiser, sun visor strap or door pocket.

How to fold: 1. Put all the pieces that are to be folded together on top of each other. 2. Hold the shades on both sides. 3. Bring your hands towards each other with a twist. 4. The lightweight wire will fold itself into a small circle. 5. Store in the provided storage pouch.

Play the video for more.

What’s special about this sunshade?

It’s made of 120 GSM mesh (versus commonly used 80 GSM), paired with 15s static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s), offering superior quality & higher density, providing better sun/UV protection. It also comes in 2 transparency options.

How can I install and uninstall this?

Wipe the window clean, throw this bad boy over the glass and give it a gentle swipe. For folding, please see video for visual explanation.

Can I open the window with this sunshade on?

No. The shades attach to the glass so they need to be removed before operating the car window.

Mine arrived with some wrinkles. Is it normal?

Yes. This is due to the nature of the plastic film and happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

What is included in the package?

This set includes 2 transparent shades, 2 semi-transparent shades & a free storage pouch. Please keep in mind they are packed back to back to protect the film from damage during shipping & may appear as 2 pieces rather sets. Pull them apart gently.

The only car window shades CERTIFIED to block 99.79% of UVA & 99.95% of UVB. SPF100 & UPF 50+
This set contains 2 transparent & 2 semi-transparent car window covers to use according to your need
Made of 120 GSM,15S Film & a unique clamp, it’s the most durable automotive interior sun protection
These foldable baby car window shades are designed to fit any windows . Each car shade is 20″x12″
Best as baby shower gift, car accessories for men, women , babies & pet in car,truck,suv,van,bus.


YOUR CHOICE OF SHADE…

Semi-Transparent Sunshades

Semi-transparent sunshades are for areas in which Sun & UV protection are more important than visibility such as baby car seat sun protection for infants, small children, pets, adults with sensitive skin, pilots of aircraft and watercraft, providing the ultimate protection for the whole family.

Transparent Sunshades

Transparent window shades are lighter shades, ideal for the front side window of a vehicle, where visibility is more important. It can also be used on any glass surface from your kitchen window to the school bus.

Quality Matters!

𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁y

Kinder Fluff sun shades are made of 120GSM (versus commonly used 80 GSM), combined with 15s tinted static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s).

𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with higher quality connector clamps, preventing breakage/separation of the wires during folding.

𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗 (SPF 100)

The Only Certified Window Sunshade in the Market!

Proven to block 99.79% of UVA and 99.95% of UVB!

With the max level of UPF in the category 50+

Trusted Brand

    Protect yourself and your loved ones from the heat, glare and the damaging sun throughout the day.

    According to EPA, most of an average person’s UV exposure from the sun occurs before the age of 18. Too much UV exposure or frequent sunburns, particularly during childhood, can cause severe or serious damage to the skin.

    For peace of mind, go with certified sunshades, choose Kinder Fluff.

Date First Available October 18, 2021

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $69.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:19:21 UTC – Details)


Enjoy the clarity and reliability of a landline phone, with easy-to-use features. Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGD632W is a 2-handset home phone system expandable up to 6 handsets, with Calling Block that makes it easy to stop up to 150 nuisance callers, plus an audible Low Battery Alert to let you know when the battery needs charging, and more. Noise Reduction Technology helps make every call as clear as possible by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone, while a full range of hands-free phone functions lets you enjoy mobility and flexibility–full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free; handset can be used as a monitor for different areas of the house (such as a baby’s room) even while away from home. Customize your caller ID to display in English or Spanish and get caller announcements in that same language so you can hear who is calling, even when you’re across the room (caller ID require additional service through your local phone company).
Cordless Telephone with Digital Answering Machine: Expandable home phone system with digital answering system that stores up to 17 minutes of messages; Quick-read Message Counter lets you check for messages easily
Block Unwanted Callers, Store Important Numbers: Block up to 150 nuisance callers using one-touch Call Block; store up to 100 items in your phonebook so you’ll never forget a number
Hear More Clearly: Noise Reduction lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone
Hands-Free Phone Functions: Hear caller announcements in English or Spanish with Taking Caller ID; Full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free and monitor different areas of the house (such as a baby’s room)
Low Battery Alert: Handset provides up to 10 hours of talk time and up to 5 days of standby time, and gives a visual and audible heads-up when the battery is low

Panasonic KX-TGD632W

2 Handset Cordless Phone System with Easy Call Block

Make working from home easier and stress-free by stopping nuisance calls in one step. Expandable to 6 handsets, the KX-TGD632W is equipped with Smart Call Block features to avoid nuisance callers and scammers, plus many other features for day-to-day convenience.

Bilingual Taking Caller ID

Caller ID displays in English or Spanish and announces caller information in the language you choose, so you never miss an important call. Caller ID displays up to 50 entries.

Easily Block Unwanted Callers

Say good-bye to scam calls and telemarketers. A one-touch Call Block button lets you easily block nuisance callers. Store up to 150 unwanted caller numbers.

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

Digital Answering System

Records up to 17 minutes of messages, available at a glance from Quick-read Message Counter. Pick up messages from the base unit or cordless handset.

Noise Reduction Technology

Reduce the background noise on the caller’s end so you can hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

Store Important Numbers

Make calls without having to dial manually with a 100-number phonebook. A 9-number speed dial gives quick access to often called & important contacts.

Speakerphone Doubles as a Baby Monitor

Place a cordless handset unit in baby's room to audibly monitor from different areas of the house or even while away from home! The monitored handset will automatically call the monitoring handset, base unit, or the phone number stored when it detects sound.

Long Battery Life with Audible Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.

Panasonic Cordless Phones Features Comparison

Panasonic KX-TGD632W

KX-TGD63x Series Phones

KX-TGD61x Series Phones

Price: $74.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:34:54 UTC – Details)


AsterOutdoor shade sail is a stylish and effective shade solution that perfect for most outdoor living space. The shade canopy provides 95% UV block, and can make you comfortable even in the hottest days. Main Features 100% Polyethylene material With 1. 5m hanging PE ropes (3 ropes for Triangle, 4 ropes for Rectangle/Square) Easy to set up with stainless steel D-rings at each corner Ideal for any outdoor event 5-year Lightweight and compact, convenient to carry in most backpacks Specification Size: 16′ x 20′ Color: Sand/Terra/Cream/Graphite Care and Maintenance Exposure to certain chemicals e. g. chlorine can lead to the premature breakdown of the fabric. Shade sails can often be best cleaned by gentle spraying with a garden hose or light scrubbing on stains with a mild strength soapy water. (Please DO NOT machine wash or DRY your sail)
Ideal Use – The outdoor sun shade sail has many uses: over a patio, lawn, garden, backyard, pool, deck, courtyard, park, carport or any other outdoor area to keep you cool in summer. You can conveniently carry it in the original bag or most backpacks since it is lightweight and compact
Durable Construction – The shade sail canopy is a rectangle shape with curved sides, enhancing pull strength and preventing drooping. The sun sail available in several stylish colors and sizes that you can choose from.
High Quality – The patio shade has 100% High Density 185GSM Polyethylene fabric, with strong stitched seams and durable stainless steel D-rings. The fabric is breathable and 95% UV block, allowing air and light to pass through for a more comfortable space. This sail shade also comes along with sturdy polyethylene ropes
Easy to Use – Attach the shade sail D-rings to your structure with the included ropes. Four 5-feet ropes and an instruction sheet come in the package. Measurement is taken from D ring to D ring, Leave an 1.5-2 ft space between the fixing point and the shade sail to fit hardware or rope.
Warranty – Comes with a 5 year warranty when used under normal weather conditions. Easy to Clean with mild detergent and water, fade resistant, will not stain and tear. For the HDPE fabric of shade sail can shrink slightly, it need tolerance for ±6 inch for each side

AsterOutdoor shade sail is a stylish and effective shade solution that perfect for most outdoor living space. The shade canopy provides 95% UV block, and can make you comfortable even in the hottest days.
